Reportable condition notification: An initial report for Pertussis and Salmonellosis has been sent to the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment and New Jersey Department of Health.

Summary:

An initial case report was electronically submitted by your organization to determine if a patient has a public health reportable condition. The conditions of Pertussis and Salmonellosis were identified and are reportable conditions in Colorado and New Jersey. Additional information needs be submitted to the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment for the report of Pertussis within 24 hours and for Salmonellosis within 7 days. The initial case report was forwarded to the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment and the New Jersey Department of Health.

Additional information for the report of Pertussis is required to be submitted within 24 hours. This additional information can be submitted here: https://www.colorado.gov/pacific/sites/default/files/DC_ComDis-Disease-Reporting_Form.pdf
Additional information for the report of Pertussis is required to be submitted within 24 hours. This additional information can be submitted here: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/pubs/surv-manual/appx/appendix11-2-pertussis-wrsht.pdf
Further Laboratory testing for Pertussis may be needed. Guidance for specimen collection is available here: https://www.colorado.gov/pacific/sites/default/files/DC_CD_VPD-Pertussis-Specimen-Collection.pdf
If you have additional questions regarding Pertussis or reporting, contact information for the Colorado Department of Health is available here: https://www.colorado.gov/pacific/cdphe/report-a-disease

Additional information for the report of Salmonellosis is required to be submitted within 7 days. This additional information can be submitted here: https://www.colorado.gov/pacific/sites/default/files/DC_ComDis-Disease-Reporting_Form.pdf
If you have additional questions regarding Salmonellosis or reporting, contact information for the Colorado Department of Health is available here: https://www.colorado.gov/pacific/cdphe/report-a-disease
